About.aboutMeDesc: Software Developer aspiring to become a Full-Stack Developer. Knowledgeable in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, SQL, and ORMs.
About.aboutMeDesc2: I started programming in C in 2022 for microcontrollers. In 2023, I began my undergraduate studies in Computer Science, focusing mainly on the basics of Java, OOP, and SQL. At the beginning of 2024, I decided to study Web Development on my own.

Contact.info: Currently searching for a job opportunity in programming. Willing to learn any technology.
